subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Life in this intimidating workplace, of course, is a choice. But what’s the hazard pay for an unglamorous N.F.L. afterlife? The league and the union have been callously unaccountable.
snippet: Life in this intimidating workplace, of course, is a choice. But what’s the hazard pay for an unglamorous N.F.L. afterlife? The league and the union have been callously unaccountable.
